title: Sweet on You
blurb: Sugary tones and affectionate motifs entwine, inviting reflection on modern sweetness amid global influences, in Sambuu’s energetic style.
artist_bio: Zayasaikhan Sambuu’s vibrant paintings fuse pop culture with Mongolian traditions, using candy-like colors and playful motifs to explore themes of consumerism, identity, and modern life.
Zayasaikhan Sambuu was born in 1975 in Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia, and lives and works there.

title: Candy Girl
blurb: A candy-hued figure pops with playful energy, fusing Mongolian motifs with consumerist whimsy to explore identity in a vibrant, graphic narrative.

title: Candy Girl 2
blurb: Sequel to the series, layering sweet colors and bold forms through Sambuu’s signature pop-traditional blend.

title: Cosmic Lotus Moth
medium: Archival pigment inks on cotton rag paper with salt crystals, gold leaf, and color pencil
blurb: Blending lotus blooms with moth forms in a starry cosmos, imagining fluid connections between earthly flora and celestial realms.

title: Cosmic Rabbit Light
blurb: A quiet rabbit floats in luminous cosmic fields, symbolizing vulnerability, intuition, and renewal.

title: Cosmic Owl Light
blurb: A contemplative owl guards a radiant atmosphere, merging wisdom with serenity.

title: Cosmic Blue Flower Light
blurb: A radiant bloom suspended between emergence and dissolution, channeling light and growth.

title: Cloud Euphoria
blurb: Billowing clouds swirl in euphoric abstraction, capturing fleeting atmospheric joy.

title: Morning
blurb: The fresh glow of dawn translated into an aspirational landscape of renewal.

title: Evening
medium: Acrylic on 300 lb. paper, white frame
blurb: Softening dusk hues blend observation and memory into a peaceful transition.
